calculator.recommendationSubtitle: Based on your emissions profile, here are the most effective actions you can take to reach your reduction target.

electricity.switchto100renewableenergy.description: Change to a provider offering certified green electricity from wind or solar sources.
electricity.installledlighting.description: Replace all conventional lighting with LED alternatives throughout your office.
electricity.smartbuildingcontrols.description: Install motion sensors and smart thermostats to reduce energy waste.
electricity.solarpanelinstallation.description: Install solar panels on your office roof to generate your own renewable electricity.

heating.buildinginsulation.description: Improve wall, roof, and window insulation to reduce heat loss.
heating.heatpumpinstallation.description: Replace fossil fuel heating systems with electric heat pumps.
heating.switchtobiogas.description: If heat pumps aren't viable, consider switching to certified biogas.
heating.lowerthermostatsetting.description: Reduce office temperature by 1-2°C during working hours.

businessTransport.electricvehiclefleet.description: Replace company cars with electric vehicles charged with renewable energy.
businessTransport.remoteworkpolicy.description: Implement a structured remote work policy to reduce commuting.
businessTransport.companybikingprogram.description: Provide company bikes or e-bikes for local trips and commuting.
businessTransport.greencommutingincentives.description: Offer financial incentives for employees using public transport.

flights.virtualmeetingpolicy.description: Implement a policy requiring virtual alternatives before approving flights.
flights.traintravelforshortdistances.description: Mandate train travel for trips under 700km when possible.
flights.combinetrips.description: Plan multiple meetings in the same region for a single trip.
flights.highqualitycarbonoffsetting.description: Invest in Gold Standard carbon offsets for unavoidable flights.
